items.name: CHILLI POPPERS (V)
items.description: 4 tempura-fried chilli poppers filled with cheese and served with sweet chilli sauce

items.name: CALAMARI
items.description: Deep-fried calamari strips in a savoury salt-and-pepper crust, served with tartar sauce

items.name: FISH CAKES
items.description: A combination of salmon, kingklip, hake and potato, deep-fried and served with tartar sauce

items.name: PRAWN SPRING ROLLS
items.description: 3 Spring rolls, deep-fried and served with sweet chilli sauce
